short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Web3 on Twitter, Telegram and Farcaster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A secure and fun way to discover new rewards, opportunities and communities on your social feed.

✓ Transforms your Feed into a rich interactive Web3. A completely re-imagined Crypto Twitter experience.
✓ Available for L1 or L2 chains: Ethereum, Base, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Avalanche, SUI, Tron, BSC, kaia, Blast, Mantle, Aptos and more.
✓ Private and secure: No personal data collected, no assets at risk.

USE CASES

• Share-to-Earn: Get rewarded for engaging content
• Smart Contract Integration: Trigger actions directly from tweets
• Governance: Delegate voting
• Trading: Buy & sell tokens seamlessly
• Community Rewards: Join incentivized promotions

And much more: Unlimited possibilities with Tapps.

REQUIREMENTS

1. A Chromium-Based Browser. For example Brave, Chrome, Mises, Arc.
2. A Web3 Wallet Compatible with EVM chains. For example, Rabby, Metamask or Phantom.
3. Use on Desktop for best experience. Can be used via Mobile Browser.

PRIVACY & SECURITY

✓ No personal information collected.
✓ No access or control over your Web3 funds.
✓ T-Link requests permission to read and change your Twitter data, which it needs for you to use and play with a Tapp on your social feed.

DISCLAIMER

— When you interact with a Tapp, you are interacting with a Smart Contract.
— ALWAYS VERIFY WHAT YOU ARE SIGNING.

COMMUNITY

✓ We release regular updates, rewards and promotions.
✓ Join us on Discord https://discord.com/smartlayer
✓ Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/SmartLayer

DEVELOPERS

✓ Chat with our core developers, join Tapp Ninjas: https://discord.gg/QkvrQC8pAf
